channel.title: Social on Transparency, Inspection, and Adaptation

item.title: Programming & Barriers to Entry
item.description: A fellow learner has posted “Programming & Barriers to Entry”. Cori has much to say in this article concentrated around command line tools, vim and Ruby. I’d like to comment on some of the perceptions and share my own opinions. I picked up on some discord with regard to this type of interaction. …Intellisense (or lack thereof). Ctrl-spacebar is my friend. It’s what I’ve grown to love. Typing /?—>enter—>up-arrow—>space—>command-I-really-need is a bit of a PITA.
